title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List not persisted between sessions
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list in the File menu is not being persisted between sessions.
OB: When opening files and navigating through the application, the MRU file list in the File menu shows the recently accessed files.
EB: However, when closing and reopening the application, the previously accessed files are no longer displayed in the MRU file list.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Open multiple files and navigate through the application.
3. Close the application.
4. Reopen the application and check the File menu MRU list.
